These 9 Instagrammers Will Give You Some Serious Wanderlust

By Eric BiellerJun 27, 2016

Posted in Travel, Lists

We love following other travelers on Instagram. In addition to giving us inspiration on where to visit next, some of their photos are just damn cool!

Here are a few of our favorite accounts that you should follow for some serious wanderlust and travel inspiration.

Nomaderhowfar

This nomadic, minimalist couple is currently traveling through Australia taking great photos and making fun YouTube videos.

Their photos are always fun and will certainly give you the travel itch.

Trippy startrail photography I did the other night here in Noosa :D #stars #milkyway #universe #photoskillz #photooftheday #photography #landscape #longexposure #instalike #awesome #moon #earth #space #nasa #noosa #queensland #visitnoosa #visitqueensland #queenslandtourism #australia #travel #backpacking

A photo posted by Hannah & Taran (@nomaderhowfar) on Apr 3, 2016 at 9:11pm PDT

Nothing familiar

This traveling couple is on a mission to visit every country in the World. Follow them on Instagram and come along for the journey!
